column1: Master Worrywort is a Hobbits  of the Shire who appears in the The Hobbit (film series). He is played by Timothy Bartlett.
In the The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey
column2: he inquires where Bilbo Baggins is off to as hes leaving for the Quest of Erebor. In the The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey (extended edition) of the film
column3: Worrywort also appears in a prior scene selling tubers near the market at the Green Dragon Inn when he encounters Bilbo
column4: who had just encountered Gandalf and declined the Wizards proposal of going on an adventure. Bilbo asks him if hes seen a Wizard around
column5: and Worrywort replies he hadnt. Bilbo immediately runs away after spotting what he thinks is Gandalfs hat.The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey

column1: In The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies
column2: Worrywort is the first to acknowledge Bilbo upon his return to the Shire. He explains to Bilbo that because he had been gone for so long
column4: and all of his possessions were being auctioned off (one of which he was carrying back home with him).The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies
